apply.file.title: Select backup file
apply.file.label: Backup file name
apply.file.hint: Drag file here or click to upload
apply.security.hint: Enter the password used to create the backup file
apply.security.description: Secrets inside the backup file are password-protected. Enter the password to continue.
apply.confirm.title: Confirm restoration
apply.confirm.merge.title: Confirm merging
apply.confirm.select.title: Confirm customized restoration
apply.confirm.text: This action might affect running processes. Ensure that all appliances are in safe state before proceeding. The device might restart several times.
apply.progress.title: Applying backup file...
apply.upload.title: Uploading backup file...
apply.source.label: Backup file storage
apply.setup-file.label: Backup file
apply.summary.text: The device settings are applied from backup file "{{param}}".

notice.general.item1: Apps might be installed or uninstalled. Device settings are updated, added or deleted.
notice.general.item2: The device reboots automatically if required.
notice.general.item3: After updating the device, login with updated credentials might be required.
notice.general.item4: Network settings can change. Reconnecting to the device might be required.

restoreMode.merge.label: Apps and settings which are part of the backup file will be updated or added. Other apps and settings remain unchanged.
restoreMode.restore.label: Apps and settings which are part of the backup file will be updated or added. Other apps and settings will be removed.
restoreMode.select.label: Selected apps and settings will be updated, added or removed.

apply.tab.label: Restore
apply.tile.description: Restore apps and settings from a backup

mainCategories.settings.title: Settings
mainCategories.settings.description: Users & permissions, network interfaces, hostname, proxy, SSH, date & time, ...
mainCategories.systemApps.title: System apps
mainCategories.customApps.title: User apps
mainCategories.certsAndKeys.title: Certificates and keys
mainCategories.activeAppData.title: Active app data
mainCategories.archivedAppData.title: Archived app data

create.format.label: File format
create.storage.title: Storage
create.storage.label: Backup file storage
create.security.description:
Secrets can only be included if a password is provided.
The password is required to restore the backup.
create.progress.title: Creating backup...
create.download.title: Downloading backup file...
create.summary.fullBackup:
You are about to create a full backup for architecture "{{param1}}" and hardware "{{param2}}".
A full backup is typically used to restore the content of the backup file as it is.
create.summary.partialBackup:
You are about to create a partial backup for architecture "{{param1}}" and hardware "{{param2}}".
A partial backup is typically used to apply selected content of the backup file.

notice.general.item1: Backup might include settings like own certificates and certificate keys, which can only be restored on the same device.
notice.general.item2: Disabled apps, licenses and the logbook are not included in the backup.

create.tab.label: Backup
create.tile.description: Create a backup with customized content

restore-operations-table.title: Differences between backup file and device found. Select the restore operations to be performed.
restore-operations-table.title.no-operations: No differences between backup file and device found.

last-created-setup.title: Backup files
last-created-setup.tile.description: Show the backup files which are currently stored on the device
last-created-setup.delete.confirm.title: Confirm deletion

report.title: Report
report.tile.description: Show the report of the last backup or restore

history.title: History
history.tile.description: Show which backups have been restored on this device
history.name: Name
history.delete.title: Delete entry
history.delete.description: History entry from {{param}} will be deleted.
